item.title: 得州石油钻井商将救赎寄望于数据中心
item.description: 人们希望，大型科技公司能够抢购水力压裂产生的废水。【原文：There are hopes that wastewater from fracking could be snapped up by Big Tech.】

item.title: 银行借并购复苏之机，提供1000亿美元收购债务融资
item.description: 债务银行家们终于等来了他们期盼多年的时刻：并购活动的回归，以及随之而来的丰厚融资业务。【原文：Debt bankers are finally getting what they’ve been waiting years for: the return of M&A and the lucrative financing that comes with it.】

item.title: 亚马逊为Ring的搜救工具招致的负面影响进行辩护
item.description: 旨在寻找走失幼犬的广告引发对监控国家的担忧【原文：Ad aimed at finding lost puppies raises fears of the surveillance state】

item.title: 优步将斥资1亿美元建设自动驾驶出租车充电站
item.description: 优步科技公司计划斥资逾1亿美元在美国建设快速充电的自动驾驶汽车充电站，此举旨在巩固其在自动驾驶出租车行业中的核心地位。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is planning to spend more than $100 million to build fast-charging, autonomous-vehicle charging stations in the US, the latest move to establish itself as a critical player in the robotaxi industry.】

item.title: 中国制造商能否将生产转移至美国？日本曾成功实现
item.description: 中国对美大规模投资可能面临阻力【原文：Resistance is likely to large-scale China investment in the US】

item.title: 特朗普关税生效，赢家与输家浮出水面
item.description: 美国贸易代表称赞孟加拉国小麦进口，而美国对华出口却举步维艰【原文：US trade representative lauds Bangladesh wheat shipment while American exports to China flounder】

item.title: KKR认为随着信贷市场日益严苛，容错空间正不断缩小
item.description: 据KKR公司称，信贷市场正变得越来越不宽容，2026年投资者若出现失误将付出更高代价。【原文：Credit markets are growing less forgiving, and missteps will cost investors more in 2026, according to KKR & Co.】

item.title: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅·谢恩鲍姆因投资计划受挫而日益不安
item.description: 克劳迪娅·谢恩鲍姆总统的旗舰投资促进计划——被吹捧为缓解美墨贸易紧张局势的经济解药——正举步维艰。【原文：President Claudia Sheinbaum’s flagship pro-investment program — touted as the economic antidote to searing US trade tensions — is struggling to get off the ground.】

item.title: 谷歌计划在美国和印度之间铺设新的光纤线路
item.description: 字母表公司宣布了多项支持其在印度扩张的新举措，包括新建连接印度与美国及南半球其他地区的光纤线路。【原文：Alphabet Inc. unveiled several new initiatives to support its expansion in India, including new fiber-optic routes that will connect the country with the US and other locations in the Southern Hemisphere.】

item.title: 嘉能可首席执行官称矿企必须达成交易，此前力拓谈判失败
item.description: 嘉能可公司首席执行官加里·纳格尔表示，随着矿业公司生产的金属和商品日益政治化，全球顶级矿企必须扩大规模，才能让自己的声音被听见。【原文：Glencore Plc boss Gary Nagle said the world’s top miners must get bigger in order to make their voices heard, as the metals and commodities they produce become increasingly political.】

item.title: 俄罗斯因资金枯竭削减石油钻探，产量面临风险
item.description: 2025年，俄罗斯石油生产商将钻井速度降至三年来的最低水平，西方制裁和卢布走强削弱了收入，使今年的产量增长前景黯淡。【原文：Russia’s oil producers reduced the pace of drilling in 2025 to the lowest level in three years, dimming the outlook for output growth this year as Western sanctions and a strong ruble undercut revenue.】

item.title: 苹果股票是当前市场中的反人工智能投资标的
item.description:
该股票近期走势常与纳斯达克100指数背道而驰。 

【原文：

The stock often moves opposite from the Nasdaq 100 these days. 

】

item.title: 伦敦市中心房价创金融危机以来最大跌幅
item.description: 官方数据显示，去年伦敦市中心房价创下全球金融危机以来最大跌幅。【原文：Inner London house prices recorded their biggest drop since the global financial crisis, according to official data for last year.】

item.title: 史无前例的"失业繁荣"考验美国经济扩张极限
item.description:
不均衡的增长使前景处于脆弱的境地。【原文：

Uneven growth puts the outlook on a fragile footing.

】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商极星因需求波动下调销售目标
item.description: 极星汽车控股英国有限公司预计今年交付量增速将放缓，以适应波动的电动汽车市场。【原文：Polestar Automotive Holding UK Plc expects growth in deliveries to slow this year, tailoring sales to a volatile electric-vehicle market.】

item.title: 人工智能失意者在Janus Henderson可持续基金中获得新机遇
item.description: 管理恒盛基金旗下旗舰可持续基金的经理表示，与人工智能相关的市场动荡导致部分估值过低，其中信息服务公司尤为突出。【原文：The manager running Janus Henderson’s flagship sustainable fund says the market turmoil related to artificial intelligence has left some valuations too low, with information services companies key among them.】

item.title: 人工智能威胁劳务派遣行业，企业纷纷将招聘业务内部化
item.description: 人工智能可能很快就能自动化完成大部分将求职者与雇主进行匹配的工作，从而减少对招聘人员服务的依赖。【原文：Artificial intelligence may soon automate much of the work of matching candidates with employers, reducing the need to engage the services of recruiters.】

item.title: 荷兰自行车制造商Accell被移交债权人，KKR承认收购失败
item.description: KKR & Co即将把Accell集团的所有权移交给其贷款方，而就在一年前，一场债务重组曾让这家陷入困境的荷兰自行车公司看到了重新起步的希望。【原文：KKR & Co is set to hand ownership of Accell Group to its lenders, just a year after a debt restructuring gave the beleaguered Dutch bicycle company hopes of a fresh start.】

item.title: Mistral首席执行官称人工智能主导权取决于开放性而非地理位置
item.description: 据Mistral AI首席执行官称，人工智能霸权之争的本质在于开放系统与封闭系统的较量，而非这些系统构建于何处。【原文：The fight for artificial intelligence supremacy is between open versus closed systems rather than where those systems are built, according to Mistral AI’s chief executive officer.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克为斯洛夫纳夫特公司释放25万吨应急石油储备
item.description: 斯洛伐克总理罗伯特·菲科表示，在俄罗斯通过乌克兰境内的友谊管道供应石油中断后，该国已为其斯洛瓦夫石油公司炼油厂释放了25万吨应急石油储备。【原文：Slovakia released 250,000 tonnes of emergency oil reserves for its Slovnaft refinery after the halt of Russian oil supplies through the Druzhba pipeline via Ukraine, Prime Minister Robert Fico said.】

item.title: 印度大学因将中国制造机器人据为己有遭猛烈抨击
item.description: 印度一所大学被指控在印度人工智能影响力峰会上将中国优树科技（Unitree）制造的机器人冒充为自主研发成果，随后被要求撤离展位。这场争议给本应展示该国技术雄心的活动蒙上阴影。【原文：An Indian university accused of passing off a robot made by China’s Unitree as its own at the India AI Impact Summit was asked to vacate its exhibition stall, in a controversy that cast a shadow over an event meant to showcase the country’s technological ambitions.】

item.title: 热度持续攀升的AT1市场迎来新突破，欧元利差创历史最低水平
item.description: 本周，一家罕见的发行机构在附加一级资本债券的关键价值指标上创下纪录，凸显出市场对这种风险最高的银行债务需求有多么旺盛。【原文：A rare issuer set a record in a key metric of value for Additional Tier 1 bonds this week, underscoring how hot demand is for this riskiest type of bank debt.】

item.title: 华尔街探底，标普指数重测"坚如磐石"支撑位
item.description: 在标普500指数创下11月以来最大单周跌幅后，华尔街策略师正努力评估该基准指数将跌至何种程度——该指数正再度测试持续数月的支撑位。【原文：After the S&P 500’s biggest weekly drop since November, Wall Street strategists are grappling with just how far the benchmark will slide as it once again tests what has been a months-long support level.】

item.title: 社交媒体成瘾诉讼如何威胁科技巨头
item.description: 全球两大社交媒体平台正面临陪审团审判，被控故意设计产品诱使年轻人上瘾——此案被比作三十年前烟草巨头因消费者成瘾问题而面临的清算。【原文：Two of the world’s largest social media platforms are facing a jury trial over allegations that they intentionally designed their products to be addictive to young people — drawing comparisons to Big Tobacco’s reckoning with consumer addiction three decades ago.】

item.title: Verizon进军欧洲，混合债券利差逼近历史低点
item.description: 威瑞森通信公司计划于周三发行欧元和英镑计价的混合债券，此时投资者对次级债务相对于优先债券要求的溢价已收窄至有记录以来的最低水平之一。【原文：Verizon Communications Inc. is looking to sell euro and sterling denominated hybrid bonds on Wednesday, just as the premium investors demand for subordinated debt over senior bonds has tightened to one of the lowest levels on record.】

item.title: 津巴布韦2026年烟草产量有望创历史新高
item.description: 津巴布韦农业部表示，该国今年预计将生产超过3.6亿公斤（7.93亿磅）烟草，将超越2025年创下的3.55亿公斤的纪录。【原文：Zimbabwe expects to produce more than 360 million kilograms (793 million pounds) of tobacco this year, surpassing a 2025 record of 355 million kilograms, the agriculture ministry said.】

item.title: 千禧一代沉迷屏幕损伤大脑，他们的孩子却对此敬而远之
item.description:
如果阿尔法世代其实一切安好呢？

【原文：

What if Gen Alpha is all right after all?

】

item.title: 肯尼亚将发行新美元债券并回购债务，因融资成本下降
item.description: 肯尼亚将发行新美元债券并回购债务，以利用较低的借贷成本。【原文：Kenya will offer new dollar bonds and repurchase debt to take advantage of lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: 苹果与纳斯达克脱钩，人工智能"打地鼠"游戏席卷市场
item.description: 苹果公司距离上次如此脱离科技同行已近20年，为投资者提供了诱人的替代选择，使其得以避开近几周席卷股市其他板块的人工智能驱动的波动。【原文：It’s been nearly 20 years since Apple Inc. was this untethered from its tech peers, giving investors an appealing alternative to the artificial intelligence-fueled volatility that has gripped most other corners of the stock market in recent weeks.】

item.title: 欧洲央行密切关注外汇市场走势，维勒鲁瓦表示
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员弗朗索瓦·维勒鲁瓦·德加洛表示，欧洲央行正密切关注外汇市场走势，并准备应对任何可能对通胀造成的影响。【原文：The European Central Bank is closely watching trends in foreign-exchange markets and is ready to respond to any possible impact on inflation, Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】
